quest.name: Learning to Lali-ho
journal:
 Quest Sync
Ronitt is ready to return to Tomra.

Ronitt has built up his courage, meaning to greet the first friendly person he sees upon his return to the village. He asks that you follow him back into Tomra, and witness his attempts to perform a proper greeting.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level.
Ronitt's first attempt is spoiled by an attack of nerves, and the object of his salutation flees in surprise. Not willing to give up, Ronitt moves on to his second target...
Once again, Ronitt's nerves get the best of him. For a moment, he is assailed by doubt, but seeing you there at his side gives him the courage to forge on. Maybe this time...

The young dwarf approaches Xemutt and digs down deep to unleash a thunderous “lali-ho.” The sheer volume of the greeting draws a small crowd of villagers, shocked to see a side of Ronitt they never knew existed. Overjoyed with his success, Ronitt suggests you go with him to visit his mother, Beott, and share the happy news.

Beott is overjoyed to witness the change that has come over her son, and showers you with gratitude. For his own part, Ronitt seems eager to continue shouting out lali-hos and building on the new friendships he has found.

dialogue.name: RONITT
dialogue.text: I'm ready! Are you ready!?

dialogue.name: RONITT
dialogue.text: I-I'm goin' back into that village to give them my best “lali-ho”!

dialogue.name: RONITT
dialogue.text: ...Y-You are comin' with me, ain't you?

dialogue.name: RONITT
dialogue.text: <gulp> Good. I'll s-start with one of the friendlier folks. Here we go!

dialogue.name: RONITT
dialogue.text: L-La... L-Lali... La-Lali...hrngh!

dialogue.name: VILLAGERA03559
dialogue.text: Gah!

dialogue.name: VILLAGERA03559
dialogue.text: Heaving hobgoblins, Ronitt! Are you mad at me or something!?

dialogue.name: RONITT
dialogue.text: <grumble> Can't give up yet! Maybe someone quieter. Gently, now...

dialogue.name: VILLAGERA03559
dialogue.text: Aye? What can I do for you, lasslad?

dialogue.name: RONITT
dialogue.text: Lali... Lali-li... Urgh!!!

dialogue.name: VILLAGERB03559
dialogue.text: Eeek!

dialogue.name: VILLAGERB03559
dialogue.text: I-I gave it back, Ronitt, I swear! I don't have your hammer!

dialogue.name: RONITT
dialogue.text: <sigh> My nerves keep gettin' the best of me. Maybe I should just stick to automata...

dialogue.name: RONITT
dialogue.text: No! I can do this! I'll not let you down after all you've done for me!

dialogue.name: VILLAGERB03559
dialogue.text: Wh-What do you want with me!?

dialogue.name: XEMUTT
dialogue.text: Hello, young Ronitt. Was there something you needed?

dialogue.name: RONITT
dialogue.text: La... Lali... Lali...

dialogue.name: RONITT
dialogue.text: Ugh...?

dialogue.name: Q2
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: You can do it, Ronitt!

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Be the dwarf you want to be!

dialogue.name: RONITT
dialogue.text: La... Lali-ho...

dialogue.name: RONITT
dialogue.text: <inhale> LALI-HOOOOOO!!!

dialogue.name: XEMUTT
dialogue.text: Lali-ho!

dialogue.name: XEMUTT
dialogue.text: Now that's what I call a greeting, dear. Well done!

dialogue.name: VILLAGERA03559
dialogue.text: I've never heard a “lali-ho” like that before, Ronitt! You damn near knocked me off my feet!

dialogue.name: VILLAGERB03559
dialogue.text: Aye! I almost thought you were going to strike old Xemutt there!

dialogue.name: XEMUTT
dialogue.text: How ridiculous. Our Ronitt would never do such a thing.

dialogue.name: XEMUTT
dialogue.text: He's a bit excitable, I'll grant you, but those angry words don't speak for his sweet heart. Who do you think dreamed up and built my helpful automaton here? It's even strong enough to carry me should I need it!

dialogue.name: XEMUTT
dialogue.text: Now, Ronitt, you've shown what you can do. How about you give a nice greeting to these good folk as well?

dialogue.name: RONITT
dialogue.text: Lali-ho!

dialogue.name: VILLAGERA03559
dialogue.text: Lali-ho, Ronitt! I fear I may've misjudged you...

dialogue.name: VILLAGERB03559
dialogue.text: Lali-hooo! Ah, a good greeting is so reassuring! And here I thought you didn't like me!

dialogue.name: VILLAGERA03559
dialogue.text: Nor me! If you've the time, I'd like to see the plans for that helper you built. An automaton strong enough to carry a full-grown dwarf...incredible!

dialogue.name: RONITT
dialogue.text: O-Of course I don't dislike any of you! And I'd be glad to share how I built my inventions!

dialogue.name: VILLAGERB03559
dialogue.text: That's a promise, then! We'll be seeing you, Ronitt!

dialogue.name: RONITT
dialogue.text: I... I can't believe it...

dialogue.name: XEMUTT
dialogue.text:
Good for you, dear.
I think a little gratitude towards your friend here might be in order, hmmm? Now, if you'll excuse me, this old lady has things to do and nary enough time to do them in...

dialogue.name: RONITT
dialogue.text: Did you see that!?

dialogue.name: RONITT
dialogue.text: I greeted people...properly! And they greeted me back! Folk want to talk to me for the first time in my life, and it's all thanks to you!

dialogue.name: RONITT
dialogue.text: Oh! You have to come and meet my mother again─so I can introduce her to my friend!

dialogue.name: XEMUTT
dialogue.text: Yes, dear?

dialogue.name: BEOTT
dialogue.text: Oh, hello, you two! Lali-ho!

dialogue.name: RONITT
dialogue.text: Lali-ho!

dialogue.name: BEOTT
dialogue.text: Well, polish my helm and shine my horns! Ronitt, you've learned to give a proper greeting!

dialogue.name: RONITT
dialogue.text: Heh heh, nothin' to it! I, uh, had a little help from a friend, though!

dialogue.name: BEOTT
dialogue.text:
Well, well, well...
What did I tell you, eh? I knew you'd be a good influence on my Ronitt!

dialogue.name: BEOTT
dialogue.text: You've done for him what his own mother couldn't, and for that I'm deeply thankful. I never thought I'd see the day...

dialogue.name: RONITT
dialogue.text: Aye, it's the oddest thing. After I'd managed the first “lali-ho,” the next one came easier...and now I never want to stop!

dialogue.name: RONITT
dialogue.text: Well, I'm guessin' you've got places to be. Just be sure to come back and visit sometime! ...N-Not that I'll be lonely or anythin'!

dialogue.name: RONITT
dialogue.text: See you soon, Forename!

dialogue.name: RONITT
dialogue.text: Heh heh! I've never felt so happy!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You have learned the emote Lali-ho!
